pages.text: $(item)Dense Redstone$() can be found by harvesting $(item)Dense Redstone Ore$() deposits with, at minimum, an $(thing)Iron-Tier Pickaxe$().$(p)$(info) $(thing)Tools$() made from $(item)Dense Redstone$() have unique properties.
$(item)Dense Redstone$() can be smashed with a hammer on an $(item)Anvil$() to procure $(item)Redstone$().
